p1: Having played the wheelchair-bound Jimmy Brooks on Degrassi: The Next Generation for seven years, Drake became one of the biggest rappers in the world when he signed with Lil Wayne's label YMCMB after leaving the show.
p2: The rapper is rarely out of the headlines, co-founding OVO Sound or representing the Toronto Raptors as the teams global ambassador. There is no surprise Jay-Z referred to him as the Kobe Bryant of hip hop
